message:
I just pushed a simple command line argument parser to my fork. Right now, it can only handle boolean switches, like --verbose, it can't understand switches that expect values.

However, it understands both short and long options, so -vn works, for instance, and is the same as -v -n

You can see how to use it in the "run-tests" file. It's the `parse-script-args` macro.
